#ifndef DLIB_STACk_
#define DLIB_STACk_

#include "stack/stack_kernel_1.h"
#include "stack/stack_kernel_c.h"
#include "algs.h"

namespace dlib
{

    template <
        typename T,
        typename mem_manager = default_memory_manager 
        >
    class stack
    {
        stack() {}
    public:
        
        //----------- kernels ---------------

        // kernel_1a        
        typedef     stack_kernel_1<T,mem_manager>    
                    kernel_1a;
        typedef     stack_kernel_c<kernel_1a>
                    kernel_1a_c;
 
    };
}

#endif // DLIB_STACk_
